title: Bonanza: Bitter Water (1960) Full Length Western

sources.title: Bonanza: Bitter Water (1960) Full Length Western
sources.description:
The Cartwrights are worried their water will be polluted when their neighbor Andy (Rhys Williams)'s son, Todd (Don Dubbins), threatens to sell his land to a miner.
 
Director: George Blair
Writer: Harold Jack Bloom
Stars: Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker
Genres: Classics, Cult, TV, Western

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdaNPO6sxm0su5BWq2dZBMZ7

@CultCinemaClassics
